citeinfo.title: Hong Kong Small Tertiary Planning Units: 2001 Census

descript.abstract: Hong Kong Small Tertiary Planning Units: 2001 Census is a polygon theme representing Hong Kong census areas at the Small Tertiary Planning Unit (STPU) level of geography. Attribute information include demographic information regarding economic activity status, monthly income, household size, type of living quarters, and occupation type.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

procstep.procdesc: Joined the seven original layers: Resident population by economic activity status, Domestic households by monthly household income in Hong Kong dollars, Domestic households by household size, Domestic households by type of living quarters, Working population by monthly income from main employment and Working population by occupation type.

cntorgp.cntorg: Digital Social Science Center (DSSC) (EDS), Columbia University Libraries
